author: adapdoaosdaoda
description: Track and display days since owners last 'borked' (made a mistake, crashed, etc.). Features personal streaks, bork history, and longest streak tracking.
install_msg: Thank you for installing PersonalBork! Use `[p]bork` to mark yourself as borked and `[p]borked` to check your current streak.
short: Track days since owners last borked
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs and timestamps of when they 'borked' to track streaks and history.
